title: What is the scope for white hat hackers in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a high scope for white hat hackers, not only in India but also in many other countries. Before going further, firstly let me describe what are white hat hackers. Also known as ethical hackers, White Hat hackers are the good guys of the hacker world. They’ll help you remove a virus or PenTest a company. Most White Hat hackers hold a college degree in IT security or computer science and must be certified to pursue a career in hacking. The most popular certification is the CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) from the EC-Council. If you are certified, you can either run a own business where you can help others to get themselves protected from being hacked, or you can get a job in any big office, the only objective is to protect their systems and giving them assurance that they will not be hacked, except in extreme conditions.
